61//
62//*****************************************************************************
63#define SYSPLLn(n) ((MCUCTRL_Type*)(MCUCTRL_BASE + (n * (MCUCTRL_BASE - MCUCTRL_BASE))))
64
65
66//*****************************************************************************
67//
68// System PLL Limit values
69//
70//*****************************************************************************
71#define AM_HAL_SYSPLL_MAX_REFDIV (63U)
72#define AM_HAL_SYSPLL_MIN_FBDIV_INT_MODE (10U)
73#define AM_HAL_SYSPLL_MAX_FBDIV_INT_MODE (960U)
74#define AM_HAL_SYSPLL_MIN_FBDIV_FRAC_MODE (10U)
75#define AM_HAL_SYSPLL_MAX_FBDIV_FRAC_MODE (96U)
76#define AM_HAL_SYSPLL_VCO_LO_MODE_FREQ_MIN (60U)
77#define AM_HAL_SYSPLL_VCO_LO_MODE_FREQ_MAX (240U)
78#define AM_HAL_SYSPLL_VCO_HI_MODE_FREQ_MIN (240U)
79#define AM_HAL_SYSPLL_VCO_HI_MODE_FREQ_MAX (960U)
80#define AM_HAL_SYSPLL_POST_DIV_MAX (7U)
81#define AM_HAL_SYSPLL_POST_DIV_TOTAL_MAX (AM_HAL_SYSPLL_POST_DIV_MAX * AM_HAL_SYSPLL_POST_DIV_MAX)
82
83#ifndef AM_HAL_SYSPLL_DEFAULT_PPM
84#define AM_HAL_SYSPLL_DEFAULT_PPM (100U)
85#endif
86//*****************************************************************************
87//
90//
91//*****************************************************************************
92#define AM_HAL_SYSPLL_POWER_ON AM_HAL_SYSCTRL_WAKE
93#define AM_HAL_SYSPLL_POWER_OFF AM_HAL_SYSCTRL_NORMALSLEEP
95
96// ****************************************************************************
97//
100//
101// ****************************************************************************
102typedef enum
103{
104 AM_HAL_SYSPLL_VCOSEL_VCOLO = MCUCTRL_PLLCTL0_VCOSELECT_VCOLO,
105 AM_HAL_SYSPLL_VCOSEL_VCOHI = MCUCTRL_PLLCTL0_VCOSELECT_VCOHI,
106} am_hal_syspll_vcosel_e;
107
108// ****************************************************************************
109//
112//
113// ****************************************************************************
114typedef enum
115{
116 AM_HAL_SYSPLL_BYPASS_NORMAL = MCUCTRL_PLLCTL0_BYPASS_NORMAL,
117 AM_HAL_SYSPLL_BYPASS_BYPASS = MCUCTRL_PLLCTL0_BYPASS_BYPASS,
118} am_hal_syspll_bypass_e;
119
120// ****************************************************************************
121//
124//
125// ****************************************************************************
126typedef enum
127{
128 AM_HAL_SYSPLL_FREFSEL_HFRC192DIV4 = MCUCTRL_PLLCTL0_FREFSEL_HFRC192DIV4,
129 AM_HAL_SYSPLL_FREFSEL_EXTREFCLK = MCUCTRL_PLLCTL0_FREFSEL_EXTREFCLK,
130 AM_HAL_SYSPLL_FREFSEL_XTAL48MHz = MCUCTRL_PLLCTL0_FREFSEL_RFXTAL48MHZ,
131} am_hal_syspll_frefsel_e;
132
133// ****************************************************************************
134//
137//
138// ****************************************************************************
139typedef enum
140{
141 AM_HAL_SYSPLL_FMODE_FRACTION = MCUCTRL_PLLCTL0_DSMPD_ACTIVE,
142 AM_HAL_SYSPLL_FMODE_INTEGER = MCUCTRL_PLLCTL0_DSMPD_POWERDOWN,
143} am_hal_syspll_fraction_mode_e;
144
145//*****************************************************************************
146//
154//
155//*****************************************************************************
156typedef struct
157{
159 am_hal_syspll_frefsel_e eFref;
160
162 am_hal_syspll_vcosel_e eVCOSel;
163
165 am_hal_syspll_fraction_mode_e eFractionMode;
166
168 uint8_t ui8RefDiv;
169
171 uint8_t ui8PostDiv1;
172
174 uint8_t ui8PostDiv2;
175
177 uint16_t ui16FBDivInt;
178
180 uint32_t ui32FBDivFrac;
181
183 bool bVCOOutEnable;
184
186 bool bPostDivOutEnable;
187} am_hal_syspll_config_t;
